messages.subject: Re: 2224 Ned AGREES with Sandra !
messages.msgSnippet: on 8/10/02 9:25 AM, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com at ... Hang onto your taglines, folks. . . . Ned AGREES. Almost anything that s created and packaged to
messages.messageBody:
on 8/10/02 9:25 AM, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com at
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com wrote:

> Subject: Re: Hooked on phonics?
Sandra writes:
>>> I would say don't buy it.

Hang onto your taglines, folks. . . . Ned AGREES.

Almost anything that's created and packaged to be used for "Education" is
junk. Hey, that's a big part of what's wrong with schools -- it's
prepackaged and predigested ideas and thoughts.

But you are a creative individual and so are your kids. You are all unique !

You can see for yourself about HOP when and if someone you know gets it, but
like Sandra implied, it's a waste of good money, and I've never seen it.

Ned Vare
Do LIFE, not School...anything but school
